content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler (position -13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. In this case, the assembling machine could not be placed at (-17.5, 23.5) due to an existing object in the way.
